description:
Transport your cake then eat it too. This double-walled bowl is easy to clean, durable, and won't burn your fingers when loaded with food fresh off the fire.

  • Made of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel
  • TouchShield™ double wall insulation shields hands from hot meals
  • Tough powder coated underside is grippy and super scratch-resistant
  • Press-fit lid for mess-free transport
  • Stackable design
name: Hydro Flask Serving Bowl with Lid 2.8L
